item.title: Foliage covering Lights, traffic detectors and traffic signs, 11th June
item.description:
Traffic Lights engineer on site 11/06/25 Signals and Detector is blocked by foliage and a sign on a lamp column see pics attached - foliage needs cutting down

item.title: Tree recently cut down on cycle path Albion Way opposite Brewers Fayre, 11th June
item.description:
A tree has recently been cut down and all the branches that were cut down have been thrown into the bushes. Please can this be cleared.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albion Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog waste bin repair, 11th June
item.description:
Received csc email 11/06/25 - Hi, I'd like to report the disintegrating dog waste bin in Alexandra Recreation ground. It's the tall green one at the top of the small park, after the kids playground and before the bowls club. It's always full and the bottom of it is so rusty the base is now disintegrating. See attached image. I'd also like to request an additional bin/dog waste bin by the bike lockers at the top of Hardings Lane. This is a high traffic area for pedestrians and we (and other dog walkers) have nowhere else nearby to dispose of dog waste. The nearest bins are in Alex Rec or the bus stop on Parish Lane. This might also help to encourage people to pick up their dog waste and bin it â€“ and keep streets cleaner. Thanks for your consideration of these requests.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westbourne Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
